attributes.action: Less tax for emergency service volunteers
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.standard.co.uk/news/london/boris-johnson-hands-serving-special-constables-150-council-tax-cut-10057670.html

This explains that Special Constables in London as receiving £150 rebate on their Council Tax as a reward for service.

It would be great to see this rolled out nationally and for more than just the Special Constabulary and other volunteer emergency services who give up their free time to assist the full time colleagues.
